title: 刚看官方1.04今天就要来了啊！
author: 注册看帖
txt_content:
本帖最后由 注册看帖 于 2011-6-10 16:27 编辑 

Update 1.0.4 Coming Friday!http://www.terrariaonline.com/threads/update-1-0-4-coming-friday.24367/

Terraria is soon expecting another large update. Not only there will be many fixes and tweaks to existing mechanics, but there will also be a few new features added to the game.

We're not going to spoil it for you, but lets just say a new boss, new mobs, and even new items are on the way!

There will also now be a server crash log. This should help find the cause of any crashes that may happen, and help hosters make an even more stable server and client environment.

Expected release date is Friday.

Edit By Blue to Clarify : Friday, Eastern Standard Time (GMT-5). So those of you elsewhere in the world, (Australia, Asia) It will be Saturday.                                

而且是个大更新
周末有得玩了啊

replies.author: god-dog
replies.txt_content:
tgwby04525 发表于 2011-6-10 16:31 
我是英文白癡看不懂
没有透露什么重要信息，只说有大的更新，加入了新BOSS，新怪物等，预计星期五（亚洲 星期六）发布

replies.txt_content: 好吧我没发现这是Terraria专区{:cry:}
